Verses: 1 aandavare, Dhevareer Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Engalukku Adaikkalamaanavar.
2 parvadhangal Thondrumunnum, Neer Boomiyaiyum Ulagaththaiyum Uruvaakkumunnum, Neere Anaadhiyaai Endrendraikkum Dhevanaayirukkireer.
3 neer Manusharai Nirththooliyaakki, Manupuththirare, Thirumbungal Engireer.
4 umadhu Paarvaikku Aayiram Varusham Netrukkazhindha Naalpolavum Raachchaamampolavum Irukkiradhu.
5 avargalai Vellampol Vaarikkondupogireer; Niththiraikku Oththirukkiraargal; Kaalaiyile Mulaikira Pullukku Oppaayirukkiraargal.
6 adhu Kaalaiyile Mulaiththup Pooththu, Maalaiyile Aruppundu Ularndhupom.
7 naangal Umadhu Kobaththinaal Azhindhu, Umadhu Ukkiraththinaal Kalangippogirom.
8 engal Akkiramangalai Umakkumunbaagavum, Engal Andharanga Paavangalai Umadhu Mugaththin Velichchaththilum Niruththineer.
9 engal Naatkalellaam Umadhu Kobaththaal Poivittadhu; Oru Kadhaiyaippol Engal Varushangalaik Kazhiththuppottom.

10 engal Aayusunaatkal Ezhubadhu Varusham, Belaththin Migudhiyaal Enbadhu Varushamaayirundhaalum, Adhin Menmaiyaanadhu Varuththamum Sanjalamume; Adhu Seekkiramaaik Kadandhupogiradhu, Naangalum Parandhupogirom.
11 umadhu Kobaththin Vallamaiyaiyum, Umakkup Bayappadaththakka Vidhamaai Umadhu Ukkiraththaiyum Arindhukollugiravan Yaar?
12 naangal Gnaana Irudhayamullavargalaagumpadi, Engal Naatkalai Ennum Arivai Engalukkup Podhiththarulum.
13 karththaave, Thirumbivaarum, Edhuvaraikkum Kobamaayiruppeer? Umadhu Adiyaarukkaagap Paridhabiyum.
14 naangal Engal Vaazhnaalellaam Kalikoorndhu Makizhumpadi, Kaalaiyile Engalai Umadhu Kirubaiyaal Thirupthiyaakkum.
15 dhevareer Engalaich Sirumaippaduththina Naatkalukkum, Naangal Thunbaththaik Kanda Varushangalukkum Sariyaai Engalai Magizhchchiyaakkum.
16 umadhu Kiriyai Umadhu Oozhiyakkaararukkum, Umadhu Magimai Avargal Pillaigalukkum Vilanguvadhaaga.
17 engal Dhevanaagiya Aandavarin Piriyam Engalmel Iruppadhaaga; Engal Kaigalin Kiriyaiyai Engalidaththil Urudhippaduththum; Aam, Engal Kaigalin Kiriyaiyai Engalidaththil Urudhippaduththiyarulum.
